document_data.name: Tower of the Moon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Moon''' was a mosque dedicated to [[Selan]] found in [[Muluk]] within the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Tower of the Moon had a spiral top complete with an observatory used to monitor the stars. The mosque stood within a beautiful garden in the northwest corner of Muluk.
